tool up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to prepare a factory for producing goods by providing the necessary tools and machinery
tool up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The factory was tooled up to produce light weapons.
tool up.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to prepare a place such as a factory for production by providing the necessary tools and machinery
tool up.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: U.S. shipyards, having had three years for preparation, were able to tool up for mass production of destroyers.
